item.title: I-95 Collapse to Lift Prices of East Coast Goods, Buttigieg Warns
item.description: I-95 Collapse in Philadelphia Disrupts East Coast Economy A section of Interstate 95 in Philadelphia collapsed on Sunday, June 12, 2023. The collapse closed a major artery for goods and commuters, and is expected to have a significant impact on the East Coast economy.

item.title: AFC Nears Closing of $500 Million Africa Climate Adaptation Fund
item.description: AFC Climate Adaptation Fund The AFC Climate Adaptation Fund is a $500 million fund that will help African countries adapt to climate change. The fund is backed by the Green Climate Fund (GCF) and is expected to close by early 2024.

item.title: Simson Says EU Still in Talks on Renewables Deal (Video)
item.description: The European Union is in talks with member states to increase the bloc’s renewable energy target to 40% by 2030. The current target is 32%. The talks are being led by Energy Commissioner Kadri Simson. Simson said on Tuesday that she is confident that a deal can be reached.

item.title: Transcript Zero Episode 40: The Climate Fight's Secret Weapon
item.description: Retirement Accounts: A Secret Weapon in the Fight Against Climate Change Pension funds have a huge amount of money that could be used to invest in sustainable companies. There is a growing demand for sustainable investments, and these investments can make equal, if not more, money than traditional investments.
